title: Incredible footage shows hero tackling gunman at Bondi beach shooting | 7NEWS
description: Video from Bondi Beach shows a man tackling one of the gunmen and wrestling his shotgun away.  The bystander can be seen crouching behind a car before rushing the gunman and fighting over his high-powered rifle.  The man then holds and points the gun at the shooter before he runs away.  He then tentatively places it against a tree before another bystander grabs something to throw at the gunman as he runs away. title: At least 12 people killed in Bondi Beach terror attack, NSW Premier Chris Minns confirms
description: At least 12 people have been killed in a mass shooting at Bondi Beach during Hanukkah celebrations, Chris Minns has confirmed. The NSW premier says one of the offenders has been killed and another is in custody. #bondi #bondibeach #bondishooting #sydney #nswpolice

title: LIVE Breaking News: Bondi Beach shooting (viewer discretion advised)
description: Two gunmen have opened fire at Bondi Beach with multiple casualties reported.  Locals reported hearing gunfire just after 6.40pm on Sunday, sending hundreds fleeing from the beach while police raced to the scene.  Footage showed two men wearing black and firing what appear to be shotguns from atop the footbridge behind the surf club.  NSW Police confirmed two people were taken into custody but urged locals to stay clear of the area while they respond to the incident.  This is a developing story.
